task.shortdesc: This section gives the information on how to create new incident for another user in ICD and JIRA intregration.

context.p: Use the following steps to create incident with diferent users

step.cmd: Go to IBM control desk, then login with existing user ID and password.
Select the JIRA user in the users section, then click on incidents option.
Provide the user information for new user by giving Reporting By and Affected By, then create the incident (Ref. Create incident XML Reference).
